# Hinterland Civil Concrete

> Professional concrete services in Cairns & Hinterland Region, Far North Queensland. Family business with 20+ years experience.

## Contact
- Phone: 0459 722 155 (Pete)
- Email: hinterlandcivilcairns@outlook.com
- Location: Cairns & Hinterland Region, QLD, Australia
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Hinterland-Civil-Concrete/61556033259349/

## Services
- Civil Concrete Works: Foundations, retaining walls, infrastructure projects & footings for residential and commercial builds.
- Formwork & Formsetters: Custom formwork design using steel & timber for complex structural requirements.
- Concrete Slabs: House slabs, shed & garage floors, and commercial flooring built for tropical conditions.
- Driveways & Pathways: Exposed aggregate, coloured concrete, brushed & stamped finishes.
- Commercial Projects: Full-scale concrete solutions for businesses, developers & construction companies.
- Remote & Regional Work: Concrete services for remote Far North QLD locations.

## Service Areas
- Cairns CBD & suburbs
- Atherton Tablelands (Atherton, Mareeba, Kuranda)
- Hinterland Region (Gordonvale, Babinda & surrounds)
- Remote & regional Far North Queensland

## Key Facts
- 20+ years experience
- 500+ projects completed
- Family-owned local business
- Free, no-obligation quotes
- Servicing all of Far North Queensland
- Residential, commercial & infrastructure projects

## Concrete Finishes Available
- Exposed aggregate
- Coloured concrete
- Brushed finish
- Stamped concrete
- Standard smooth finish

## How to Get a Quote
Call Pete on 0459 722 155 or email hinterlandcivilcairns@outlook.com. They'll arrange a site visit and provide a detailed, no-obligation quote.
